description:
Triton hits the treadmill; the treadmill hits back. The Ambassador of Magma becomes the Representative of Bling. News anchor Oguma gets a taste of Boyacky Therapy. The cabbage farmer is hunting for a wife who can work a pickup truck.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Operation: Triton`s Diet / Good Buy Shopping / Zip! Peeping Life TV: News Anchor Masu and News Anchor Oguma Chat Session / Matchmaking Center: Farmer`s Firstborn Son
Triton no Diet Daisakusen / Good Buy Shopping (24K Necklace Hen) / ZIP! x PLTV Masu-ana to Oguma-ana no Zatsudan / Kekkon Soudanjo: Nouka no Chounan Hen
トリトンのダイエット大作戦 / グッバイ・ショッピング(24Kネックレス編) / ZIP!xPLTV 桝アナと小熊アナの雑談 / 結婚相談所 農家の長男編
